pkgmetadata.longdescription: gwk/pdfminer3 is a fork of pdfminer/pdfminer.six, which is in turn derived from euske/pdfminer.pdfminer3 is a tool for extracting information from PDF documents.Unlike other PDF-related tools, it focuses entirely on getting and analyzing text data.pdfminer3 obtains the exact location of texts in a page, as well as other information such as fonts or lines.It includes a PDF converter that can transform PDF files into other text formats (such as HTML).It has an extensible PDF parser that can be used for other purposes instead of text analysis.
